"ALWAYS OVER THE WATER"
Nothing more serious can happen to an Aeromarine in
flight than an enforced descent—and herein is one of the
great advantages of travel in flying boats you always,
always have the necessary alighting space.
You fly only
over the broad free spaces of the waters' surface.
This
gives you the knowledge of 100 per cent. safety when
you take your flight.
AEROMARINE AIRWAYS, Inc.
Largest Aerial Transportation Comany
in the World
Operating Flying Boats
Executive Offices:
1800 TIMES BUILDING, NEW YORK

"BE SURE IT'S AN AEROMARINE"
DELIGHTFUL, COMFORTABLE, INEX-
FLY PENSIVE FLYING BOAROMARINE
FLYING BOATS
SEE YOUR CITY FROM THE AIR
Enjoy a flight in the giant flying boat
"SANTA MARIA"
Interior view of forward cabin, furnished in mahogany
and silver,
with six big, comfortable
reclining chairs.
The after cabin seats five and is fitted up as a lounge or
card room.
Largest Aerial Transportation Company in the
World (Operating Flying Boats).
Thousands of enthusiastic passengers have seen
the wonderful panorama afforded by a flight in
these safe, luxurious Aeromarine boats.
You see more on a few minutes' flight than you
could in a year of ordinary travel, while having
the assurance of being absolutely safe.
AEROMARINE
WHITE AERIAL FLEET
Eleven Passenger Enclosed Cabin Air Cruisers
Six Passenger Navy Open Cockpit Flying Boats
